forecast-period.text: Sunny. Patchy fog early this morning. Winds north to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h turning westerly during the morning then becoming light in the late afternoon. Daytime maximum temperatures in the low to mid 20s.
Sun protection 10:00am to 1:40pm, UV Index predicted to reach 4 [Moderate]
Sunny. Patchy fog in the north in the early morning. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to around 9 with daytime temperatures reaching the low 20s.
Mostly sunny. Light winds becoming southerly 20 to 30 km/h during the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to between 7 and 10 with daytime temperatures reaching around 20.

Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower in the north, near zero chance elsewhere. Winds southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h turning southerly 25 to 35 km/h during the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to around 9 with daytime temperatures reaching around 19.

Sunny. Patchy fog about early this morning. Winds west to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h tending west to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h in the morning then becoming light in the late afternoon. Daytime maximum temperatures between 14 and 22.
Sun protection 10:20am to 1:20pm, UV Index predicted to reach 4 [Moderate]
Sunny. Patches of morning frost in the south. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to between zero and 7 with daytime temperatures reaching between 15 and 21.

Partly cloudy. Patches of morning frost about higher ground. Medium (50%) chance of showers in the south, slight (30%) chance elsewhere. Snow possible above 1200 metres. Winds west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending south to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h during the morning then tending west to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 8 with daytime temperatures reaching between 12 and 19.

Mostly sunny. Winds west to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h tending south to southwesterly during the morning then tending west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 3 and 10 with daytime temperatures reaching between 13 and 20.

Sunny. Winds west to northwesterly 25 to 35 km/h tending west to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h in the middle of the day then becoming light in the late afternoon. Daytime maximum temperatures between 14 and 18.
Sun protection 11:00am to 1:00pm, UV Index predicted to reach 3 [Moderate]

Sunny. Patchy fog about the Upper Hunter in the early morning. Patches of morning frost. Light winds becoming west to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the morning then becoming light in the early afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between zero and 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 14 and 18.

Partly cloudy. Areas of morning fog about the Upper Hunter. Medium (40%) chance of showers. Snow possible above 1200 metres. Light winds becoming southeast to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h during the morning then tending west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 7 with daytime temperatures reaching between 12 and 16.

Mostly sunny. The chance of morning fog about the Upper Hunter. Winds northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending southeast to southwesterly during the morning then becoming light during the afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 8 with daytime temperatures reaching between 14 and 18.

Sunny. Patchy fog early this morning. Winds west to northwesterly 20 to 30 km/h tending west to southwesterly 25 to 40 km/h in the morning then becoming light in the evening. Daytime maximum temperatures between 12 and 22.
Sun protection 10:10am to 1:40pm, UV Index predicted to reach 4 [Moderate]

Areas of fog in the early morning. Areas of frost in the morning, mainly on and west of the ranges. Sunny day. Light winds becoming north to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the morning then becoming light in the middle of the day. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 3 and 8 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 13 and 20.

Mostly sunny. Patches of frost in the morning, mainly on and west of the ranges. Light winds becoming southeast to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 2 and 7 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 11 and 18.

Mostly sunny. Areas of morning frost in the south. Winds south to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h tending east to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 1 and 8 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 12 and 18.
Sunny. Winds westerly 25 to 40 km/h. Daytime maximum temperatures between 11 and 17.
Sun protection not recommended, UV Index predicted to reach 2 [Low]

Partly cloudy. Patches of light morning frost about higher ground. Slight (20%) chance of a shower in the south in the evening. Near zero chance of rain elsewhere. Winds westerly 25 to 35 km/h. Overnight temperatures falling to between 1 and 7 with daytime temperatures reaching between 13 and 18.

Partly cloudy. Medium (50%) chance of showers. Winds west to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h tending south to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h during the morning then tending west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 8 with daytime temperatures reaching between 11 and 16.

Mostly sunny. Areas of morning frost about the Southern Highlands. Winds west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending southeast to southwesterly during the day then becoming light during the afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between zero and 8 with daytime temperatures reaching between 13 and 18.

Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower near the Victorian border this morning, near zero chance elsewhere. Winds west to northwesterly 25 to 35 km/h tending west to southwesterly in the morning then tending west to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the evening. Daytime maximum temperatures between 13 and 17.
Sun protection not recommended, UV Index predicted to reach 2 [Low]

Partly cloudy. Patches of morning frost inland. Medium (50%) chance of showers in the afternoon and evening. Winds west to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h tending west to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h in the middle of the day. Overnight temperatures falling to between 1 and 6 with daytime temperatures reaching between 14 and 18.

Partly cloudy. Patches of morning frost about the coastal ranges. Medium (40%) chance of showers near the Victorian border, slight (20%) chance elsewhere. Winds west to southwesterly 25 to 35 km/h tending south to southwesterly during the day then tending west to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h during the afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 6 with daytime temperatures reaching between 12 and 16.

Mostly sunny. Areas of morning frost about the coastal ranges. Winds westerly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light during the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 7 with daytime temperatures reaching between 14 and 17.

Cloud clearing. Slight (20%) chance of shower in the south this morning. Winds west to southwesterly 25 to 35 km/h becoming southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h in the late afternoon then becoming light in the late evening. Daytime maximum temperatures between 8 and 15.
Sun protection 11:10am to 1:00pm, UV Index predicted to reach 3 [Moderate]

Partly cloudy. Areas of fog and frost in the morning. Winds west to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h becoming light in the late evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 2 and 2 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 10 and 16.

Mostly sunny. Areas of morning fog in the west. Patches of morning frost in the south. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Winds west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h turning south to southeasterly during the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to between zero and 4 with daytime temperatures reaching between 9 and 15.

Mostly sunny. The chance of morning fog in the west. Areas of morning frost. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 3 and 2 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 12 and 17.
Partly cloudy. Patches of early morning frost. Winds westerly 25 to 35 km/h decreasing to 15 to 20 km/h in the evening. Daytime maximum temperatures between 9 and 12.
Sun protection not recommended, UV Index predicted to reach 2 [Low]

Partly cloudy. Patches of morning frost. Slight (30%) chance of a shower in the late afternoon and evening. Snow possible above 1300 metres in the late evening. Winds west to northwesterly 25 to 35 km/h becoming light in the late evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 2 and 1 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 10 and 13.

Mostly sunny. Areas of morning fog in the northwest. Patches of morning frost. Slight (20%) chance of a shower in the east, near zero chance elsewhere. Winds west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending south to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the day. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 2 and 1 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 10 and 13.
The chance of morning fog. Areas of morning frost. Mostly sunny day. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 4 and minus 1 with daytime temperatures reaching around 13.
Sunny. Patchy fog on the slopes early this morning. Winds southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h becoming light in the late afternoon. Daytime maximum temperatures between 16 and 20.
Sun protection 10:30am to 1:40pm, UV Index predicted to reach 4 [Moderate]

Sunny. Areas of fog on the southern slopes in the early morning. Areas of frost in the morning, mainly in the south. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 1 and 4 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 15 and 19.

Sunny. Areas of morning fog on the southern slopes. Patches of morning frost on the southern slopes. Winds southerly 15 to 20 km/h turning southeasterly during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between zero and 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 15 and 20.
Sunny. Winds southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h becoming light during the day. Overnight temperatures falling to between 1 and 6 with daytime temperatures reaching between 16 and 21.
Mostly sunny. Winds southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light in the late afternoon. Daytime maximum temperatures between 13 and 18.
Sun protection 11:30am to 1:00pm, UV Index predicted to reach 3 [Moderate]

Partly cloudy. Areas of fog and frost in the morning. Slight (30%) chance of a shower on the southern plains in the afternoon and evening. Near zero chance of rain elsewhere. Light winds becoming south to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the middle of the day then becoming light in the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 1 and 2 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 14 and 18.

Mostly sunny. Areas of morning fog on the southern slopes. Winds southerly 15 to 25 km/h becoming light during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 13 and 17.

Sunny. The chance of morning fog on the southern plains. Areas of morning frost on the southern plains. Light winds becoming southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the day. Overnight temperatures falling to between zero and 3 with daytime temperatures reaching between 15 and 19.

Partly cloudy. Patchy morning fog near the Victorian border. Slight (20%) chance of a shower early this morning, possibly falling as snow above 900 metres. Patches of morning frost near the Victorian border. Winds westerly 20 to 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Daytime maximum temperatures between 6 and 12.
Sun protection not recommended, UV Index predicted to reach 2 [Low]

Cloudy. Areas of fog and patches of frost in the morning. High (80%) chance of showers near the Victorian border, medium (40%) chance elsewhere. Snow falling above 1200 metres. Winds northwest to northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h tending northwest to southwesterly in the middle of the day then becoming light in the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 2 and 1 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 8 and 13.

Mostly sunny. Patches of morning frost. Areas of morning fog in the north. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 2 and 1 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 9 and 13.
The chance of morning fog. Areas of morning frost. Sunny day. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to around minus 2 with daytime temperatures reaching between 11 and 15.
Mostly sunny. Patchy fog early this morning. Light winds. Daytime maximum temperatures between 12 and 16.
Sun protection not recommended, UV Index predicted to reach 2 [Low]

Cloudy. Areas of fog in the east in the early morning. Medium (50%) chance of showers in the morning and afternoon. Winds north to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h shifting south to southwesterly in the late morning and early afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between 3 and 7 with daytime temperatures reaching between 13 and 17.

Mostly sunny. Patches of morning frost in the south. Light winds becoming southerly 15 to 20 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to around 2 with daytime temperatures reaching around 15.
The chance of morning fog. Areas of morning frost. Sunny day. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 1 and 1 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching around 16.
Mostly sunny. Light winds. Daytime maximum temperatures between 17 and 20.
Sun protection 10:50am to 1:50pm, UV Index predicted to reach 3 [Moderate]

Partly cloudy. Areas of fog in the southeast in the early morning. Patches of morning frost in the east. Light winds becoming south to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the early afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 6 with daytime temperatures reaching around 19.
Mostly sunny. Winds south to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h. Overnight temperatures falling to between 4 and 8 with daytime temperatures reaching between 16 and 19.
Sunny. Winds southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h. Overnight temperatures falling to between 1 and 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 17 and 20.
Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower near the Victorian border this evening. Near zero chance of rain elsewhere. Light winds. Daytime maximum temperatures around 17.
Sun protection 11:50am to 1:20pm, UV Index predicted to reach 3 [Moderate]

Partly cloudy. Areas of fog and patches of frost in the far east in the morning. Slight (30%) chance of a shower. Light winds becoming west to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h in the morning then shifting southerly in the middle of the day. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 8 with daytime temperatures reaching between 16 and 19.

Mostly sunny. Patchy morning fog near the South Australian border. Light winds becoming south to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to around 3 with daytime temperatures reaching around 16.
The chance of morning fog. Areas of morning frost in the south. Sunny day. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to around 1 with daytime temperatures reaching around 17.

Mostly sunny in the east, partly cloudy in the west. Patches of morning frost. Slight (30%) chance of a morning snow shower about the alpine peaks. Snow possible above 900 metres. Winds westerly 25 to 35 km/h decreasing to 15 to 20 km/h in the late afternoon then turning north to northwesterly in the evening.
Sun protection not recommended, UV Index predicted to reach 2 [Low]

Cloudy. Patchy fog in the north in the early morning. Patches of morning frost. High (80%) chance of showers about the alpine peaks, medium (60%) chance elsewhere. Snow falling above 1100 metres. Winds north to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h turning west to southwesterly 25 to 35 km/h in the late morning and early afternoon.

Partly cloudy. Patches of morning frost. Slight (30%) chance of a shower near the Victorian border, near zero chance elsewhere. Snow possible above 1100 metres. Winds west to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h tending south to southwesterly 25 to 35 km/h during the morning then tending west to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h during the evening.
Areas of frost and the chance of fog in the morning. Mostly sunny afternoon. Winds northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light during the morning.
